channel.title: diffusion-limited aggregation on Jacob Calvert
channel.description: Recent content in diffusion-limited aggregation on Jacob Calvert

item.title: The first disproof of a prediction about DLA
item.description: This post highlights recent work which, for the first time, rigorously rules-out a prediction made about diffusion-limited aggregation (DLA), a paradigmatic model of random, dendritic growth.
